meanings.definition: The quality or state of being militant.
meanings.sent1: Her militantnesses in defending her beliefs was admirable.
meanings.sent2: The group's militantnesses were evident in their protests.
meanings.sent3: His militantnesses in arguing for extra recess time made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The militantnesses of the storm were felt by all who witnessed its power.
meanings.sent5: The militantnesses of the lion's roar echoed through the jungle.

meanings.definition: The actions or behaviors characteristic of a militant individual or group.
meanings.sent1: The militantnesses of the soldiers were evident in their strict discipline.
meanings.sent2: Her militantnesses in the debate club made her a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its militantnesses by fiercely protecting its territory.
meanings.sent4: The militantnesses of the waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The militantnesses of the protesters could be seen in their determined faces.
